details.body:
The following table shows you where to find guidance about the taxation of travelling and related subsistence payments in particular occupations.
**Guidance****Circumstance**
[EIM68610](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM68610.htm)Travelling and subsistence allowances paid to recorders, circuit judges etc in England and Wales
[EIM50100](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM50100.htm)Cost of leave travel facilities provided for the armed forces
Employment Status ManualTravelling expenses paid to workers supplied by agencies
[EIM62600](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM62600.htm)Travelling and subsistence allowances paid to engineering design employees
[EIM70745](http://www.hmrc.gov.uk/manuals/eimanual/EIM70745.htm)Expenses paid to teachers for home to school travel when attending out of school functions
